name: stringed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of a musical instrument) having thin wires that are stretched across the instrument and are used to produce a range of notes depending on their thickness, length, and tightness: Music therapy most often involves stringed instruments, especially the harp. The man was playing music on a magical stringed gourd.
(also string) consisting of people playing stringed instruments: A stringed orchestra played softly in the background. The piece can be played on the harpsichord or organ, or even by a stringed quartet. The stringed passages accompanying the love scenes represent the emotions of the characters.
having or operated by strings or wires: The crossbow has a stringed bow mounted on a wooden stock with a cocking mechanism. She walked across the stage with her legs wobbly, like a stringed puppet.
